channel.title: Pre-Animated Skillcape Base!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2yuzp50_th.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/30lz12h_th.png[/img][/center] [center]The ugly colors are for people to differentiate the sections. The MQO file contains the PRI:, TSKIN:, and VSKIN1: "layers". Don't edit the first 255 materials labeled 1-255. That is part of the masterpalette, which is used to code the priorities and tskin. Click [url=http://uppit.com/y2eid52ckobz/Pre-animated_skillcape_base.mqo]here[/url] to download. All I ask of you is that you do NOT upload your fancy new custom recolored skillcape to the models section, unless you're ready for people to flame you. The purpose of this is for people who know the basics of metasequoia, but don't know how to do skillcapes. Don't try and upload a "show-off" design of your skillcape, because nobody really cares. [/center]
[center]Credits[/center] [center][s]Jagex: 98%[/s][/center] [center]Jagex: 99%[/center] [center]Me: 1%[/center]

item.title: Pre-Animated Skillcape Base!
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

h1 sk1ller:

Lool!! Haha, just bringing back skillcape recolors in 2010 gj fagget.

its for noobie modelors, its pre animated and they can just recoler it to whatever they want and add there own thing, it’d be ridiculous to release a recolor and not give proper credits, i mean, recolors dont need to be released, im sure he released this for people to recolor and add for there server, not to release and say haha look at my pimp ass cape cause i just leech and recolor

Read full topic

item.title: Pre-Animated Skillcape Base!
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:34, topic:370731”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=466828.msg3428339#msg3428339 date=1292120337]
Its the childish flame presented by this topic as an example as to why i rarely visit mopar anymore.

OT:Will help alot of people. ive animated a skillcape before and it turned out to be a nightmare, so good job on this.
[/quote]
I hear ya. I just try filtering out all of the immature, childish comments. Although no other communities really can have discussions with me about animation and modeling. RL is full of programmers and R-S doesn’t work for me anymore.[/quote]

I hang out in the r-s client section mainly, been working a little on a server with ghost++, working pretty well.
I never visit rL, it just never appealed to me. But enough of going off topic

Read full topic

item.title: Pre-Animated Skillcape Base!
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

lolz every thread h1 skiller posted in is fked
Ontopic: This is actually quite nice, i never got my custom capes animated 100%ish. definitely gonna use this. And no im not gonna post the “recolors” i’m gonna make lolz.

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:30, topic:370731”][quote author=lord killord link=topic=466828.msg3426511#msg3426511 date=1291967329]

You are all fucking stupid if you think this is a recolor.

I don’t model, and I can tell it’s the animated tSkins.

+1

But all the same … this will never work. People are going to come on here crying about their icons they put on the cape not working because they don’t actually know how to animate it for themselves… it’s better if they learnt themselves.
[/quote]

-2[/quote]
lol’d

Read full topic

item.title: Pre-Animated Skillcape Base!
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:24, topic:370731”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=466828.msg3421295#msg3421295 date=1291526990]

If you want to start one of these flame wars, you can’t seem to phrase a sentence properly, and you used “your” in place of “you’re”. And it’s REALLY hard to not read your post in a negative way when you call me a faggot.

Seriously, calm the fuck down! I never did anything to start, you told me that im as smart as a grade 3 child, that I’m the biggest troll on mopar, and that I can’t read.

All I said was to read my posts in ways other than negative!! This is why you people flame me, you don’t understand the way in which I say things…

We flame you because you’re an attention whore. You’ve posted about 3 threads saying “Hey everybody, I’m quitting.” And then come back later.

And “read my posts in ways other than negative” wasn’t all you said.

“I never did anything to start” read your first post on this thread? You called me a “fagget”.

You always try and say that you didn’t start anything, but you do.
[/quote]

Sorry for having my own opinion. I don’t want attention I just want respect.
Just stop, this happened ages ago just let it go :D[/quote]

There’s a difference between having an opinion and blatantly insulting someone. And telling everyone you’re quitting 3 times doesn’t get you respect.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

the wanderer:

You couldn’t quote him either. and you said that he needed to learn how to quote. Doesn’t matter anyways because you took that out.

Because somehow he messed it up, and if I tried to type it at the bottom, it would still come out with me quoting myself.

I Vain I:

If I had the time, I would take the time to correct all your grammatical mishaps in your previous posts, but unfortunately, I will not live forever.

Huehuehue.
His grammar was far worse than mine, and I’m only 13.

I Vain I:

Doubles negatives are not grammatically incorrect.

They are a part of grammar, and double negatives are usually frowned upon by grammar Nazi’s.

I don’t model, and I can tell it’s the animated tSkins.[/quote]
actually the colors on that cape aren’t tskins vain. But it is animated. And really all you need to do to accomplish this is find a skillcape in datmaker, then click export to MQO v2.
